NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 221? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {519} from {Engineering} to {Natural Sciences}, a flow of {263} from {Natural Sciences} to {Engineering}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 69? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 80 and 120? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Engineering to Natural Sciences or from Natural Sciences to Health Sciences?
NC.A: The flow from {Engineering} to {Natural Sciences} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Engineering to Natural Sciences, from Engineering to Computer Science, or from Natural Sciences to Computer Science?

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Computer Science, Arc Natural Sciences, Arc Engineering, Arc Health Sciences}.
